Apply here to start an extraordinary career today. *  *  AES’s mission is to improve lives by accelerating a safer and greener energy future. The group consists of Transmission Strategy, Interconnection, High Voltage Engineering, SCADA/Communications, and Generation Modeling and Technical Compliance teams. *  *  The Generation Modeling and Technical Compliance team is seeking a dynamic and passionate Generator Modeling Engineer to oversee generator models throughout the project lifecycle for ACE’s rapidly growing renewable portfolio – modeling generators from interconnection study phases, through construction, and through operations.
